definition: to uncover/to ferret out (the culprit)
to seize/to clutch/to grab firmly and pull

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: Well done. Find out some other US officials and repatriate them.
sentences.chinese: 干得好，把其他美国官员揪出来，然后遣返。

sentences.english: Faithful grand also at the same time follow at sb' heels and go, think uncover kidnaps and sell dealer this.
sentences.chinese: 忠浩亦同时尾随而去，想揪出这个拐卖贩子。

sentences.english: Now imagine the scene some time later when she is discovered.
sentences.chinese: 不妨设想一下，一段时候后那名女子被揪出来的场景。

sentences.english: Fact of rash sea act is critically his wrong thought, and uncover Chen Ke.
sentences.chinese: 鲁海用事实批判了他的错误思想，并揪出了陈克。

sentences.english: Somebody paid him to do that, and I'm going to find out who it was.
sentences.chinese: 有人买通他这么做，我要揪出来那人是谁。

sentences.english: What am I suppose to do?
We'll winkle the criminal out of there.
sentences.chinese: 我们要把犯罪分子从那儿揪出来。

sentences.english: They are seeking to unkennel traitors.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在设法揪出叛徒。

sentences.english: It is the first time that such a large group of illegals has been uncovered.
sentences.chinese: 一下子揪出如此多的非法者，还是首次。

sentences.english: I'm gonna get this Gilligan bastard.
sentences.chinese: 我要揪出吉利根这个混蛋。

definition: culprit
lit. to follow the vine to get to the melon/to track sth following clues
malign agent who manipulates from behind the scenes/hidden hand
to punish according to the law/to bring to justice
to investigate thoroughly
to expose/to bring to light/to disclose/revelation
to bring to justice
as the water recedes, the rocks appear (idiom)/the truth comes to light
to play tricks/to cause mischief
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
to find out/to ascertain/to get to the bottom of/to clarify
to try to find out/to trace/to track down
mole/spy/rat/traitor
malign agent who manipulates from behind the scenes/hidden hand/(Tw) mechanic/blue-collar worker/manual laborer
murderer/assassin
